Package com.brandon.BasicWebApp2.controller

Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
com.brandon.BasicWebApp2.controller.AccountController
@Controller
public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller that handles many shared actions between all three account types
Author:
bdabr

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String accountSettings​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Allows each account type to change/view various information about themselves.
    java.lang.String changePaymentInfo​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Displays form for changing credit card information
    java.lang.String changePaymentInfo2​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Takes data from the form and alters payment informartion (or deletes it, if all fields equal 0)
    java.lang.String changeUserInfo​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Uses data recieved in form to alter login/user infortmation (excluding the username used to log in)
    java.lang.String userHomePage​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Handles homepages for each account type.
    java.lang.String userInfoSettings​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
    Loads the form to change infortmation/password about your account
    java.lang.String viewMyAccountInfo​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
    View account information
